about_the_game: Creators is a first person shooter where users participate in massive battles either online or locally with AI. The game comes with a powerful in game scenario editor, ensuring that the only limit for what is possible is your imagination. Customize your character with cosmetics you earn not by paying for them but for playing the actual game. Prepare your favorite loadouts consisting of 3 weapons and not the 2 you see in similar titles. Utilize advanced movement to outplay your opponents and dominate the battlefield. Creators was meant not to be a competitive shooter but to be fun above all else, so please enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: Creators is a First Person Shooting Game and therefore inherently contains violent acts as well as gore that would take place on a typical battlefield. Foul language can also be expected as soldiers in the game have voice cues depending on what is happening on the battlefield.
